_template_info.description: Enrich Node - Enriches parsed items with additional product data

replace_values.{{VENDOR_NAME}}: e.g., Europa, Marchon, Kenmark (for parser reference)
replace_values.{{VENDOR_SLUG}}: e.g., europa, marchon, kenmark (lowercase for URL endpoint)
replace_values.{{POSITION_Y}}: Same Y position as parser node (offset by -72 from Bulk-Add)
replace_values.{{ENRICH_NUMBER}}: Increment for each new vendor (e.g., Enrich8, Enrich9)
